oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Davies. Lloyd Davies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lloyd Davis as baby, in yard in rocking chair. Dog and chicken nearby. Son of James and Jessie Lonas Davies. In Bearden area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Infants; Rocking chairs; Dogs; Chickens;
